page.title: 14Owning a small shop
page.content: Owning a small shop is hard work in Belfast. Your day just doesnt start at 9.ooam and end at 5.00pm like with an ordinary worker as there are always books to be taken home and kept up-tp-date. My father is a butcher and,especially working with food he has to be extra particular about hygiene. To start out on your own business you would first consult your bank manager who would want to know the amount of money involved and decide whether or not to lend you the money. Supermarkets today have the power to buy in bulk and sell the goods at a price the small shopkeepers cannot compete with. In Ireland in the past ten years 11,000 small shops have had to close owing to the rise in the number of supermarkets opening.
